name: Oxfam America
mission:
Oxfam is a global organization that fights inequality to end poverty and injustice. We offer lifesaving
support in times of crisis and advocate for economic justice, gender equality, and climate action. We
demand equal rights and equal treatment so that everyone can thrive, not just survive. The future is
equal.
theoryOfChange: Oxfam America operates under a "Global Strategic Framework 2020-2030" which guides their efforts to fight inequality and end poverty and injustice. This framework emphasizes collaborating and innovating globally, and shifting resources and power to marginalized communities. Additionally, Oxfam has developed a "Corporate Inequality Framework (CIF)" to help investors analyze how companies contribute to inequality. There is also a "Theory of Change Co-Created by Young People: Youth-led input to Oxfam's Youth Participation and Leadership Meta Theory of Change," which was developed through co-creation workshops and serves as a foundational reference for youth programming strategies. Oxfam America also implements rigorous monitoring, evaluation, and learning (MEL) systems for all long-term programs, major campaigns, and key innovation projects, including baselines, monitoring reports, annual reviews, and evaluations.

zakatClaimEvidence: Organization is in zakat denylist (partners but doesn't collect directly) (Source: https://www.oxfamamerica.org/)

ui_signals_v1.recommendation_rationale: Strong donor fit, low risk profile, and credible supporting evidence for outcomes.

components.evidence: Asnaf: fuqara (+5); Operates in Muslim-majority regions (+3); Humanitarian service (+2)
components.improvement_suggestion: Add a dedicated zakat page or clearly state whether donations are zakat-eligible.
components.name: Muslim Donor Fit

alignment.rationale: Alignment 36/50: MEDIUM Muslim donor fit, humanitarian cause area

score_details.score_summary: Oxfam AmericaHQ shows exceptional impact and strong alignment.

zakat.claim_evidence: Organization is in zakat denylist (partners but doesn't collect directly) (Source: https://www.oxfamamerica.org/)

all_citations.claim: Oxfam America holds a Charity Navigator score of 99.33333333333333/100 and maintains a fundraising efficiency of $0.19 per $1 raised.
The organization works with local organizations to empower poor people in the development of their communities.
all_citations.source_name: Download our most recent financial audit

all_citations.claim: Oxfam's programs have resulted in new laws being passed with Civil Society Organization (CSO) input.
all_citations.source_name: Download NORAD Ghana Final Project Evaluation Report

all_citations.claim: The organization tracks impact through metrics like unique viewers of the Civilinfo platform and media capacity ratings.
all_citations.source_name: Download NORAD Mozambique Final Project Evaluation Report

all_citations.claim: Oxfam's advocacy work led to the adoption of legislative amendments in Tanzania.
all_citations.source_name: Download NORAD Tanzania Final Project Evaluation Report

all_citations.claim: Oxfam America provides various donation options for general charitable giving and sadaqah.
The organization reported total revenue of $83,115,051 and a program expense ratio of 72.3%.

baseline_narrative.amal_score_rationale: Oxfam America earns a high overall score due to its exceptional financial transparency and direct provision of humanitarian aid, though its alignment is categorized as medium for specific donor segments.
areas_for_improvement: Moderate donor alignment for specific niche audiences
High operational complexity across multiple international jurisdictions

dimension_explanations.alignment: Oxfam America shows strong alignment with urgent humanitarian causes and offers various sadaqah-eligible giving methods for donors [6]. While it maintains a high track record of success in media and civil society capacity building in regions like Mozambique, it is categorized as a medium donor fit for those seeking specialized religious-specific financial pathways [4][6].
dimension_explanations.impact: The organization demonstrates high impact through direct provision of services, maintaining a program expense ratio of 72.3% [1][7]. Its effectiveness is evidenced by successful legislative outcomes, such as new laws passed with CSO input in Ghana and legislative amendments in Tanzania [3][5]. Additionally, the organization maintains high data confidence and cost-effective operations, spending only $0.19 per $1 raised [1].

baseline_narrative.headline: Oxfam America empowers local communities through economic justice and lifesaving relief to combat the root causes of global poverty.
strengths: High financial accountability with a Charity Navigator score of 99.33333333333333/100
Strong liquidity with 8.0 months of working capital available
Proven track record in legislative advocacy and civil society capacity building
baseline_narrative.summary: Oxfam America is a global development organization that partners with local entities to provide funds and empower marginalized populations in their regional development [2]. The organization focuses on international relief, economic justice, and providing lifesaving support during humanitarian crises [1][6].
